es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.index

Interface FastUserIndex<U>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    All Superinterfaces:
    UserIndex<U>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastPreferenceData<U,I,V>, FastRecommender<U,I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFastPreferenceData, AbstractFastRecommender, CachedUserNeighborhood, Factorization, FastRankingRecommender, InvertedUserNeighborhood, ItemNeighborhoodRecommender, MFRecommender, PopularityRecommender, RandomRecommender, RerankingRecommender, SetCosineUserSimilarity, SetJaccardUserSimilarity, SimpleFastPreferenceData, SimpleFastUserIndex, ThresholdUserNeighborhood, TopKUserNeighborhood, TransposedPreferenceData, UserNeighborhood, UserNeighborhoodRecommender, UserSimilarity, VectorCosineUserSimilarity, VectorJaccardUserSimilarity

    public interface FastUserIndex<U>
extends UserIndex<U>
    Fast version of UserIndex, where users are internally represented with numerical indices from 0 (inclusive) to the number of indexed users (exclusive).
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
